The Fontana History of European War and Society is a five-volume history of war and society in Europe from 1450 to 1970. It was published by Fontana in association with the University of Leicester. The series editor was Geoffrey Best, who also wrote the first volume in the series.Geoffrey Best Books & Biography. Harper Collins. Retrieved 28 February 2018.
